children.name: visible
children.description: Gets or sets the visibilty of the current element.

children.name: points
children.description: Gets or sets the polyline points.

children.name: stroke.width
children.description: Defines the stroke width of the polyline.

children.name: stroke.color
children.description: Defines the line color of the polyline.

children.name: stroke
children.description: Defines the stroke configuration.

children.name: startCap.type
children.description: The start cap type.The supported values are:* "none": no cap* "ArrowStart": a filled arrow* "FilledCircle": a filled circle

children.name: startCap.stroke.width
children.description: The start cap stroke width.

children.name: startCap.stroke.dashType
children.description: The start cap stroke dash type.

children.name: startCap.stroke.color
children.description: The start cap stroke color.

children.name: startCap.stroke
children.description: The start cap stroke options or color.

children.name: startCap.fill.opacity
children.description: The start cap fill opacity.

children.name: startCap.fill.color
children.description: The start cap fill color.

children.name: startCap.fill
children.description: The start cap fill options or color.

children.name: startCap
children.description: The start cap configuration or type name.

children.name: fill.gradient.stops.opacity
children.description: The fill opacity.Ranges from 0 (completely transparent) to 1 (completely opaque).

children.name: fill.gradient.stops.color
children.description: The color in any of the following formats.| Format         | Description| ---            | --- | ---| red            | [Basic](http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/#html4) or [Extended](http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/#svg-color) CSS Color name| #ff0000        | Hex RGB value| rgb(255, 0, 0) | RGB valueSpecifying 'none', 'transparent' or '' (empty string) will clear the fill.

children.name: fill.gradient.stops.offset
children.description: The stop offset from the start of the element.Ranges from 0 (start of gradient) to 1 (end of gradient).

children.name: fill.gradient.stops
children.description: The array of gradient color stops.

children.name: fill.gradient.end
children.description: The end point of the linear gradient.Coordinates are relative to the shape bounding box.For example [0, 0] is top left and [1, 1] is bottom right.

children.name: fill.gradient.start
children.description: The start point of the linear gradient.Coordinates are relative to the shape bounding box.For example [0, 0] is top left and [1, 1] is bottom right.

children.name: fill.gradient.radius
children.description: The radius of the radial gradient relative to the shape bounding box.

children.name: fill.gradient.center
children.description: The center of the radial gradient.Coordinates are relative to the shape bounding box.For example [0, 0] is top left and [1, 1] is bottom right.

children.name: fill.gradient.type
children.description: The type of the gradient. Supported values are:* linear* radialNote that support for radial gradients in VML (IE8 and below) is limited.Not all configurations are guaranteed to work.

children.name: fill.gradient
children.description: Defines the gradient fill of the polyline.

children.name: fill.opacity
children.description: Defines the fill opacity of the polyline.

children.name: fill.color
children.description: Defines the fill color of the polyline.

children.name: fill
children.description: Defines the fill options of the polyline.

children.name: endCap.type
children.description: The end cap type.The supported values are:* "none": no cap* "ArrowEnd": a filled arrow* "FilledCircle": a filled circle

children.name: endCap.stroke.width
children.description: The end cap stroke width.

children.name: endCap.stroke.dashType
children.description: The end cap stroke dash type.

children.name: endCap.stroke.color
children.description: The end cap stroke color.

children.name: endCap.stroke
children.description: The end cap stroke options or color.

children.name: endCap.fill.opacity
children.description: The end cap fill opacity.

children.name: endCap.fill.color
children.description: The end cap fill color.

children.name: endCap.fill
children.description: The end cap fill options or color.

children.name: endCap
children.description: The end cap configuration or type name.
